items.title: Can't yet challenge cement majors in M&A, says JSW Cement's Parth Jindal, instead will focus on organic growth
items.description: JSW Cement's Parth Jindal said the company would focus on greenfield projects as well as brownfield expansion to reach its near-term capacity target of 41.85 million tonne per annum (MTPA), compared to 20.60 MTPA at the end of FY25.

items.title: Pharma giant Eli Lilly opens strategic technology and innovation hub in Hyderabad
items.description: The US pharmaceutical giant has already hired 100 professionals and plans to expand its headcount to 1,500 in the coming years, focusing on roles in AI, automation, cloud computing, and software engineering.

items.title: Tesla approves $30 billion stock award for CEO Elon Musk
items.description: The board emphasized the importance of retaining Musk, saying in a shareholder letter that the award was a first step 'good faith' payment. 'After all, a ‘deal is a deal'

items.title: Marico Q1 Results: Net profit rises 8% to Rs 513 crore; revenue surges 23%, margins slip
items.description: Marico Ltd Q1 FY26 Results: Net Profit shows healthy growth on the back of a jump in revenue. However, the FMCG firm's operating margin contracted.

items.title: VinFast opens $500 million EV plant in Tamil Nadu, eyes Asian expansion
items.description: The $500 million plant, located in Tamil Nadu’s industrial corridor, will initially produce 50,000 electric cars per year, with the capacity to ramp up to 150,000 units.

items.title: Data Story: A revamped Cognizant is upping the ante for Indian IT
items.description: Cognizant has won more mega deals compared to Indian IT peers so far this year

items.title: Will Saregama’s content-led strategy drive the next phase of growth?
items.description: The company delivered a steady Q1FY26, confirming its leadership in the monetisation of entertainment IP

items.title: EV leadership, global thrust fuel TVS journey
items.description: Robust demand for two-wheelers power strong quarterly performance

items.title: ITC Q1 FY26: What will drive valuation as cigarette volumes remain steady?
items.description: FMCG growth recovery, urban demand, and stable commodity prices to aid growth, profitability

items.title: Power Grid Q1: Rs 7,000-crore capex, Rs 1.9 lakh crore pipeline, and push into BESS, hydrogen, global projects
items.description: The state-run transmission major incurred a Q1FY26 capex of Rs 6,981 crore, a sharp 51 percent jump over last year’s Rs 4,615 crore.

items.title: Kalyan Jewellers eyeing expansion through franchise model to reduce debt
items.description: The Thrissur-headquartered company has a capex of around Rs 350-400 crore for maintenance and inventory for this financial year
